name: Can'T move Can'T Jump can't ShOOt
name_original: Can'T move Can'T Jump can't ShOOt
description:
With the theme in main I though of making a game where you start but you cant do anything, at the time pass you will get one of the three main habilitis, move, jump, or shoot, kill the enemies if you can shoot or dodge if you only can move. (if you press S you can get down the platform).

Rate in LDJAM!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/$170720
